uvi.product_version: versions from v3.14 to before v4.14.238
uvi.description:
i2c: robotfuzz-osif: fix control-request directions

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.238 by commit 8ab0e49cc8eeabae4f31805e979173bb00ee472e, it was introduced in version v3.14 by commit 83e53a8f120f2f273cf0ad717f5372ab79ac24fe. For more details please see the references link.
